ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Largos Absonant Binding (lvl 51)
ygData.msgSnippet: The higher their starting agility the less AC they will lose.  Try casting Binding on yourself with your agility buffed to 145 or more if possible and observe
ygData.messageBody:
The higher their starting agility the less AC they will lose. Try casting
Binding on yourself with your agility buffed to 145 or more if possible and
observe the difference in AC loss. I for one would be curious in the
effect.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 06, 2001 3:25 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Largos Absonant Binding (lvl 51)


At 11:52 AM 2/6/01 -1000, you wrote:
>So is it safe to assume that when you hit a mob with the 51 song, their
>agility is also lowered less than 75 and as a result the total AC debuff
>from this song is close to 60+?

yep, this would probably be the case. oh, assuming of course that their
starting agility is the same as your starting agility.


>Galtin of E'ci
